import React, {useContext, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {useParams, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import ProductItemGrid from '../utils/productsItem/ProductsItemGrid' function DetailProduct() { const params = useParams() const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [products] = state.productsAPI.products const addCart = state.userAPI.addCart const addWishlist = state.userAPI.addWishlist const [page, setPage] = state.productsAPI.page const [detailProduct, setDetailProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() =>{ setPage(5); if(params.id){ products.forEach(product => { if(product._id === params.id) setDetailProduct(product) }) } },[params.id, products]) if(detailProduct.length === 0) return null; return ( <>

{detailProduct.title}

{detailProduct.price}đ

{detailProduct.description}

Đã bán: {detailProduct.sold}

{ isAdmin ? <> deleteProduct(product._id, product.images.public_id)}>Xoá Sửa : <>
Số lượng
addCart(detailProduct)}>+ Thêm vào giỏ hàng
addWishlist(detailProduct)}>Yêu thích
}
  • Kiểu dáng: {detailProduct.style}
  • Màu sắc: {detailProduct.color}
  • Chất liệu: {detailProduct.material}

SẢN PHẨM LIÊN QUAN

{ products.map(product => { return (product.category === detailProduct.category ?
: null ) }) }
) } export default DetailProduct
